price: Ṣé nígbà tí a bá ti kú, tí a ti di erùpẹ̀ (ni a óò tún jí dìde padà). Ìyẹn ni ìdápadà tó jìnnà (sí n̄ǹkan tí ó lè ṣẹlẹ̀).
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
